alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 2:36PM MST until August 12 at 3:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 315 PM MST. * At 236 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Phoenix Mesa Gateway Airport, or 7 miles southwest of Apache Junction, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mesa, Chandler, Gilbert, Apache Junction, Queen Creek, Chandler Heights, Gilbert City Hall, Chandler City Hall, San Tan Village Mall, San Tan Valley, Seville, Phoenix Mesa Gateway Airport, San Tan Mountain Park, Superstition Springs Mall and Gold Camp. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 188 and 196. AZ Route 87 near mile marker 166. AZ Route 202 between mile markers 29 and 47. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
